def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def route = parse.route log.info route assert route!=null
def docTypeRes = parse.docType log.info docTypeRes assert docTypeRes!=null
assert docTypeRes == "ROUTING_RULE"
